title: Add online scheduling and replace logo with user-provided image

requirements.text: Create a new scheduling page accessible from the main navigation with a form allowing customers to request service appointments. The form should include fields for customer name, phone number, email, service address, preferred date, preferred time window (morning/afternoon/evening), service type dropdown (matching the six services: Sprinkler Repair, Sprinkler Installation, Spring Startup, Winterization, Leak Detection, System Upgrades), and additional notes. Include form validation and a submit button that displays a confirmation message upon submission.
acceptanceCriteria: A new 'Schedule Service' link appears in the header navigation menu
The scheduling page includes all required form fields with appropriate input types
Form validation prevents submission with missing required fields
Service type dropdown includes all six services from the ServicesGrid component
Upon successful form submission, a confirmation message is displayed to the user
The page maintains the existing mobile-first responsive design with deep blue and green color scheme

requirements.text: Add a 'Schedule Service' link to the header navigation menu between 'Contact' and the phone number, routing to the new scheduling page at /schedule
acceptanceCriteria: The 'Schedule Service' link appears in the Header component navigation
Clicking the link navigates to /schedule route
Active state styling is applied when on the scheduling page
Link is responsive and appears in the mobile hamburger menu

requirements.text: Replace all instances of the R Irrigation logo throughout the site (in the Header component and anywhere else it appears) with the user-provided logo image file 9962DF11-5A7E-4582-A58F-DBC7D2FE64A8.png, maintaining appropriate sizing and responsive behavior
acceptanceCriteria: The new logo image replaces the existing R Irrigation logo in the Header component
Logo maintains appropriate dimensions and aspect ratio on desktop and mobile
Logo is clickable and navigates to the homepage
Logo displays clearly on both light and dark backgrounds if applicable
Image is optimized for web delivery

requirements.text: Add prominent 'Schedule Service' call-to-action buttons on the homepage HeroSection (alongside existing Call Now and Request Free Estimate buttons) and in the CTABlock component to drive traffic to the new scheduling page
acceptanceCriteria: A 'Schedule Service' button appears in the HeroSection with consistent styling to existing CTA buttons
A 'Schedule Service' button or link appears in the CTABlock component
Buttons use the bright green accent color to stand out
Clicking buttons navigates to /schedule route
Buttons are mobile-responsive and maintain hierarchy with phone number CTA

constraints: Do not modify the backend - all scheduling functionality is frontend-only for now
Maintain the existing mobile-first responsive design and deep blue/bright green color scheme
Keep the header navigation structure clean and not overcrowded
nonGoals: Backend integration for storing scheduling requests
Calendar picker UI (simple date input is sufficient)
User account creation or login for scheduling
